Introduce.welcome: Hi Dear, Welcome to my personal website
Introduce.know-more: Click here if you want to know me better

About.title: About
About.description: Hello again. I am Sajad Mahdian, born in 1994. After my bachelor's degree, I entered the professional field and have been developing web-based applications professionally since 2018. Most of my experience is in working with the React library. In fact, I have developed most of the different dashboards. But this book does not mean that I do not work with other libraries and do not have experience in using them, but rather that I have more experience in developing dashboards. I am interested in using new technologies in my field.
About.guiding-to-resume: Below, to help you become more familiar with my skills, I have provided you with my resume for download. I tried to keep it concise so that it doesn't cause you too much headache.

amin.title: Amin
amin.description: A landing page that created by next v12 for Amin Integrated Circuit Nanosystems Research Center

bluk.description: A landing page that created with react. This app create for buy/sale buildings

poseChecker.title: Position Checker
poseChecker.description: A dashboard that created by react, mui, formik, rtkQuery and etc for online monitoring employees body position and rate them and suggest them best practices, base on manager demand

amin_systems.summary: Frontend Developer specializing in React-based web applications and dashboard development for nanosystems research center.

description.0: Developed and maintained the company's main website using Next.js 12
description.1: Created responsive user interfaces for research project showcases
description.2: Implemented modern web standards and optimized performance
description.3: Collaborated with research teams to present complex technical information
description.4: Ensured cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness

dorsa_cloud.summary: Senior Frontend Developer responsible for building cloud service dashboards and client-facing web applications.

description.0: Led frontend development of cloud service management dashboard
description.1: Built customer portal using React, MUI, and RTK Query
description.2: Migrated legacy applications from Next.js 12 to Next.js 15 App Router
description.3: Implemented form handling with Formik and validation systems
description.4: Developed real-time monitoring interfaces for cloud services
description.5: Mentored junior developers and established coding standards

gcloud_systems.summary: Frontend Developer focused on enterprise dashboard development and data visualization interfaces.

description.0: Developed complex data visualization dashboards using React and MUI
description.1: Implemented state management with Redux Toolkit and RTK Query
description.2: Created responsive layouts for various screen sizes and devices
description.3: Built form handling systems with validation and error management
description.4: Optimized application performance and loading times
description.5: Collaborated with backend teams to integrate REST APIs
